abstract: Stocks fell broadly and sharply after a report on mortgage defaults indicated that the troubled housing market will weaken further.
snippet: Stocks fell broadly and sharply after a report on mortgage defaults indicated that the troubled housing market will weaken further.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell broadly and sharply yesterday afternoon after a report on mortgage defaults indicated that the troubled housing market will weaken further before showing signs of improvement.

headline.main: Bad Loans Put Wall St. in a Swoon
headline.print_headline: Bad Loans Put Wall St. In a Swoon
